channel.title: Icy Realm
channel.description:
Due to the following issues: Financial: (Don't have the money for a dedi) Time: (With college and plans for med school I cannot waste time coding) Boredom: (Getting bored of coding)
Do Note: This server was a project that is unfinished. There will be some parts that don't work, again unfinised project. Up to you to do the rest!
Links: [CENTER][URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/714/titlenc.jpg/][IMG]http://img714.imageshack.us/img714/3509/titlenc.jpg[/img][/URL]
Creating a 317 server just for fun and hopefully hosting purposes one day.
Beta link: [URL=http://"http://uppit.com/5oi90vc43s0d/Icy_client.rar"]Client click me[/URL]
Note: It is extreme beta! will be dc's from updates. Not on a dedicated server (its only a beta afterall) Will be adding much more places to train. If you need help type ::yell If I am on I will drop what I am doing and help you out gladly. Have fun :)[/SIZE]
Keep in mind the beta will be just that: - Non-dedicated server - glitches (which I hope the players find and report :D) - And some features may be unplayable (make remarks reguarding this and suggests to make them smoother, more playable)[/COLOR]
Will be located on the F2P side of runescape, everything will be functional. I mean everything, from doors, to talking to npcs, staircases, drawers ect. Will not have any items above the 317 cache, except for skillcapes and teleport tablets.
All of this is based off of winterlove, used some battlescape features for npc support.
Progress:
Combat:
Melee: Melee combat: Perfect specials Perfect delayed hits with animation Combat Flawless maxhit calculation Clipped following
Range: Perfect projectiles + drawback Specials perfectly timed Deleting + dropping arrows Delayed hits Longrange vs rapid and accurate Ranging while clipped following
Mage: Perfect spelltime calculation Mage following when autocast clipped Correct rune amounts All non combat spells
Non-Combat Skills:
For all non combat skills, you get 1 gp per 1 xp. Promote the idea of doing them. Runecrafting: Talisman location Pouches Multiple ess based on level
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/833/talismanm.png/][IMG]http://img833.imageshack.us/img833/6928/talismanm.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/851/bagi.png/][IMG]http://img851.imageshack.us/img851/3310/bagi.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/404/multiplerunes.png/][IMG]http://img404.imageshack.us/img404/8051/multiplerunes.png[/img][/URL]
Agility: Multiple courses Rewards: Werewolf: sticks right before zipline, trade in for exp Gnome & barbarian: agility tickets to exchange for exp or rewards such as pirate hook or herbs
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/12/agility1i.png/][IMG]http://img12.imageshack.us/img12/6594/agility1i.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/854/agility2.png/][IMG]http://img854.imageshack.us/img854/6021/agility2.png[/img][/URL]
Herblore Herb Identifying Pestle & Mortar Potion making
Thieving: Stall support Most nearby guards will attack you if caught thieving Pickpocketing Pickpocket failing
Crafting: Jewelry Stringing Hides Gem cutting
Fletching: Cutting logs with knife All log types supported Making + stringing of longbow's and shortbows Arrows [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/714/arrowheads.png/][IMG]http://img714.imageshack.us/img714/3171/arrowheads.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/209/logsfletch.png/][IMG]http://img209.imageshack.us/img209/4274/logsfletch.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/585/makinglogs.png/][IMG]http://img585.imageshack.us/img585/6959/makinglogs.png[/img][/URL]
Slayer: Did not get around to adding, up to you gentlemen :)
Mining + Smithing: Full ore depletion and regeneration of rocks Mining gems Rock smoking - breaking pickaxe if you don't get off it Spawning golems randomly, level based off your combat level Smithing with coal requirement Refining iron ore based on level
Fishing + cooking: All spots Required equipment + bait Correct animation and timer for getting fish Cooking of all fish and uncooked products Proper level requirements for cooking Proper levels to no longer burn + cooking gauntlets support
Firemaking + Woodcutting: Full tree support, trees have certain amount of logs before disappearing Trees have longer regrow times depending on type Full clipped firemaking with force walk west. You put a log on the ground and then light it, so if you walk away you leave a log. If you burn fast enough your animation doesn't take place
Minigames: Undead Waves: - 20 waves - Waves are always different, can have an unlimited combination of the three npcs being (Giant zombie, zombie, nechromancer) - Each wave has one more than the last, wave 20 has 20 npcs, 19 has 19 ect. - If you fail before you complete you are simply given coins per wave - If you complete all 20 you are rewarded with a casket that has a mystery inside
Mage Arena: Graveyard minigame Alchemists playground Enchanters minigame Progress hat dialogue pizzaz points for infinity and wands
Duel Arena: Full staking support Rules support Anti-dupe, x-logging, scamming.
Jad: Undecided how many waves Jad mage, range, melee Other npcs in the Jad waves with proper hits and moves
Barrows: Random brother in cave each time Random Barrow loot Digging to get to their dens
Npcs: Perfect combat with respect to player armor and npc's attack type and level Proper animations and economical drops Npc Vs Npc combat Respect to multizones Aggression Bosses: Kalphite Queen Jad Gunthar (level 112) Khazard General Dragons
Media:
[URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bzCmnuVPw2M&lc=ZaORZgLZGc8JxKV852nN1eg8L2fm4ruTmoTBhyMQUE0&feature=inbox"]Mage Arena - Graveyard[/URL] [URL=http://"http://imageshack.us/clip/my-videos/708/39y.mp4/"]Mage Arena - Alchemists Playground[/URL] [URL=http://"http://imageshack.us/clip/my-videos/857/k8fz.mp4/"]Mage Arena - Enchanters[/URL] [URL=http://"http://imageshack.us/clip/my-videos/849/8zy.mp4/"]Mining Video - With Random Events[/URL] [URL=http://"http://imageshack.us/clip/my-videos/207/66223105.mp4/"]Rc + Fletching[/URL] [URL=http://"http://imageshack.us/clip/my-videos/26/scz.mp4/"]Undead Waves[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R7pLBoeExH0&feature=youtu.be"]Crafting Video[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MlgBIIfw3zI&feature=youtu.be"]Kalphite Queen[/URL]
[url=http://www.multiupload.com/7NM3FIRLI6]http://www.multiupload.com/7NM3FIRLI6[/url]
Enjoy.
Edit: I know the coding is sloppy, but there is approximately zero fucks given in reguards to that :hurr:
Second edit: I would be more than thrilled to help code anything that someone needs. Reguardless of what it is! Just message me :)

item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

i hax unit:

I’m sorry, it’s a bit of a grave dig, but I deleted this amazing server awhile ago from my computer awhile ago on accident. So can you please re-upload?

Please take the time to click the OPs profile link and realize he has not been active for a year+ now. Stop bumping these topics.
